b:if.cond: data:title != "{ads}" and not (data:widget.type == "HTML" and data:title contains "getMailchimp")

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:class.expr:name: data:skin.vars.gridstyle == "1px" ? "post hentry item-" + data:i : "post hentry item-" + data:i

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

div.p: This gadget is no longer available.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.topad_onpost == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "top-ads")
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.ticker_onpost == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "ticker")
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "trending"))

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:class.expr:name: data:skin.vars.gridstyle == "1px" ? "post hentry item-" + data:i : "post hentry item-" + data:i

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:tag.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["niadzgn-pro-main-before-ad","niadzgn-pro-main-after-ad"]))
b:tag.name: div

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-main-before-ad"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 1

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-main-after-ad"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 2

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "niadzgn-pro-post-footer-ads"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 3

b:widget.title: {getMailchimp} $title={MailChimp Form} $text={Subscribe to our mailing list to get the new updates.}

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.footerad_onpost == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads")
